Class LibraryUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • SystemUser
      • LibraryUser

  • public class LibraryUser
extends SystemUser
    The LibraryUser class represents library user as a user of the Library Management System It contains such operations as borrowing or returning books All methods return String message indicating result of the request to the underlying database

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class SystemUser

        booksBorrowed, name, password, status, surname

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LibraryUser(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String password) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String borrowBook(DataBase booksDataBase, DataBase usersDataBase, java.lang.String bookName, java.lang.String author)
      Borrows a book from the library If the book is in the library and copies are left,fixes book after user in a users database and reduces number of copies left in a books database
      java.lang.String returnBook(DataBase booksDataBase, DataBase usersDataBase, java.lang.String bookName, java.lang.String author)
      Returns a book to the library If the book is fixed after the user,removes the book from the list of the books borrowed by the user in a users database,and increments number of copies of the book in a books database

      • Methods inherited from class SystemUser

        getName, getStatus, getSurname, logIn

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • borrowBook

        public java.lang.String borrowBook(DataBase booksDataBase,
                                   DataBase usersDataBase,
                                   java.lang.String bookName,
                                   java.lang.String author)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Borrows a book from the library If the book is in the library and copies are left,fixes book after user in a users database and reduces number of copies left in a books database
        Parameters:
        booksDataBase - The books database
        usersDataBase - The users database
        bookName - The name of the book wished to borrowed
        author - The author of the book wished to be borrowed
        Returns:
        result message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if could not create a Record using books data or if booksDataBase.numberOfFields() < 3 or usersDataBase.numberOfFields() < 5

      • returnBook

        public java.lang.String returnBook(DataBase booksDataBase,
                                   DataBase usersDataBase,
                                   java.lang.String bookName,
                                   java.lang.String author)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a book to the library If the book is fixed after the user,removes the book from the list of the books borrowed by the user in a users database,and increments number of copies of the book in a books database
        Parameters:
        booksDataBase - The books database
        usersDataBase - The users database
        bookName - The name of the book wished to returned
        author - The author of the book wished to be returned
        Returns:
        result message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if could not create a Record using books data or if booksDataBase.numberOfFields() < 3 or usersDataBase.numberOfFields() < 5
